name: Barkha Herman
what_you_do: Barkha Herman is a founder, technologist, writer, and speaker dedicated to bridging the gap between complex technology and real-world impact, helping companies and communities tell their stories, engage their audiences, and drive innovation.
who_you_serve: Barkha serves women in tech and professionals looking to enhance their communication and leadership skills through training and workshops.
signature_programs: WiTVoices: Speaker Training for Women, SFWIT: Empowering WiTs in SoFla, Vegan42
bio: Devs Empowered 500+, Time in Tech 35+ years, Spoke at 50+ conferences
business_focus: Barkha Herman is a founder, technologist, writer, and speaker dedicated to bridging the gap between complex technology and real-world impact, helping companies and communities tell their stories, engage their audiences, and drive innovation. (technology training)
audience_type: Barkha serves women in tech and professionals looking to enhance their communication and leadership
